title: Régis Manon
text:
Régis Manon (22 October 1965 – 1 January 2018) was a Gabonese professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach.
Career.
Born in <a href="Libreville">Libreville</a>, Manon played club football for <a href="FC%20105%20Libreville">FC 105 Libreville</a>, <a href="Tours%20FC">Tours B</a>, <a href="Tours%20FC">Tours</a> and <a href="US%20Jou%C3%A9-l%C3%A8s-Tours">Joué-lès-Tours</a>.
He also played for the <a href="Gabon%20national%20football%20team">Gabonese national team</a>, and was a squad member at the <a href="1994%20Africa%20Cup%20of%20Nations">1994 Africa Cup of Nations</a>.
He later became a coach, for teams including <a href="Mounana%20FC">Mounana</a> and <a href="Akanda%20FC">Akanda</a>.
